page.title: 05THE UNION CANAL
page.content:
THE {THOMAS TELFORD}IS A PRIVATELY OWNED BARGE.IT CAME AFTER THE {JANET {TELFORD}.
SOON A NEW BARGE IS GOING TO BE COMMISSIONED TO THE STRETCH OF CANAL AT RATHO.IT HAS BEEN BOUGHT FROM FALKIRK AND IS TO BE USED FOR PLEASURE TRIPS.IT IS CALLED THE {GULVIN SEAGULL
ONE OF THE MOST IMPORTANT BARGES ON THE CANAL IS THE ONE WICH IS USED BY THE BRITISH INLAND WATERWAYS BOARD. THIS BARGE IS EQUIPPED WITH A CRANE AND ITS JOB IS TO DREDGE THE CANAL TO KEEP IT CLEAR FOR OTHER CANAL TRAFFIC.
THE CANAL IS BEGINNING TO BE USED MORE AND MORE FOR PLEASURE PURPOSES BU THE LOCAL COMMUNITY..
